replies.msg:
Question: The government should control the Internet to reduce cyber-crime and ensure safety of users. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?

Answer:
Flipping through newspaper and magazine, setting restrictions for Internet activities has become a debatable topic over the decades. To a large extent, I disagree the government control the internet based on two reasons: Freedom of Speech and protection of users' privacy.
此回覆已被刪除

To begin with, freedom of speech will be limited if the government add control to the Internet. Before discussing why it will be limited, we should first clarify the term  "Cyber Crime". Taking Hong Kong as an example, after 01/07/2020, voicing the political views opposing People Republic of China can be viewed as "crime". In other words, the freedom of speech, which is the core value of western democratic country, is violated in this example. If the freedom of speech is restricted, the most serious consequence is that the citizens lose confidence to the city. The future development of the society will be negatively affected. This explains the importance of freedom of speech and why the government should not impose intervention to Internet activities.

What is more, data privacy will become a top issue to deal with if the government control the Internet. China is a good example, Most of the business activities rely on Internet, such as credit payment and banking transaction. Unfortunately, most of the beneficial owners of those payment apps(such as Alipay and Wechat pay) and bank are "State Owned Enterprise". In other words, the clients' data can easily obtained by Chinese Government. Most people around the world agree that Chinese government is not reliable. The safety of users hence cannot be guaranteed. Given the aforementioned analysis, data privacy of users become the powerful argument to support my stand.
All in all, to a large extent, I disagree that government control the internet. The freedom of speech and data privacy are valuable asset to our society.
